DOCNAME: DIMITROVSKA v. "THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF MACEDONIA"
JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Volodymyr Butkevych;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . She was represented before the Court by Mr PERSON , a retired lawyer from GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
On DATE the applicant 's husband , Mr NORP , brought a civil action against ORG ( “ NORP ” ) in the former GPE claiming salary arrears and other employment - related allowances .

On DATE ORG rejected PERSON claim as falling outside its competence . That decision was confirmed by ORG of DATE . On DATE ORG granted PERSON appeal on points of law and remitted the case for re - examination . It held that the NORP courts had been competent to decide the case , in particular as it had involved obligations enforceable in the ORG .
On DATE ORG Instance dismissed PERSON D. 's claim . On DATE he appealed .
On DATE ORG dismissed PERSON appeal .

On DATE the applicant requested the public prosecutor to lodge an application for the protection of legality ( барање за заштита на законитоста ) with ORG . On DATE the public prosecutor informed the applicant that there were no grounds for using that remedy .
